report.title: Luminosity
report.author: Tia Serendipia
report.bodytext: One week and one day later, I can write about this. /n There is SO much to convey, to report, I won't be able to share it all. /n Layers upon layers upon layers of experiences, that continue to this moment /n in calm and profound ways. I did the right thing. /n /n I began preparations a week before, cutting out meats, focusing on things /n I wanted to change in my life, intentionally introspective and self aware /n to the best of my ability. All this time, I had the feeling that Iboga was /n aware of me. I'll say this once, then just let it go: I'm reporting some /n things that won't jibe with consensus reality. Nevertheless, they are real. /n Think what you will. /n /n The day before I was going to take the Ibogaine, I ate only vegetables, and had /n my last cigarette in the evening. I'd been sober off alcohol for about, /n well, 4 weeks? I spent time in the jacuzzi, /n relaxing and focusing, praying and meditating. I invited Iboga in /n intentionally during a meditation. Interestingly, I felt acceptance, and my /n visualization was intense. Felt like it wasn't self generated at all, and /n included splitting me open at the middle (solar plexus? xyphoid process to /n pubis?). I sealed and sent my intention with the energy generated by /n orgasm, then with some trepidation, went to bed. /n /n The next morning at 9am, I took a test dose of TA extract. I tolerated /n this well and took a flood dose carefuly calculated for my height, weight, /n gender and length of sobriety. This did not take me where I needed to go, /n and so over time, in 300-400mg increments, I made it up to over 3 grams of /n extract. Apparently I was a hard nut to crack. Two other people I have /n spoken with used the same product and found it very potent, so that wasn't /n the issue. (Wish I had boosters, though!!! Damn!). /n /n At around 3?4? in the afternoon, I looked in the mirror across from the /n bed and saw some people peeking around the corner of it-from the inside- to /n check if I was ready. I called for a giant mouthful of plain yogurt, I was /n craving it like mad, lay down, and went on a journey. :) /n /n I threw up only twice, shortly after that, quickly and painlessly. I /n suffered no prolonged nausea and no dry heaves. /n /n My BP was strong the entire time, not much fluctuation from my normal /n 100/70. My pulse stayed at an average 56 beats. I was so incredibly /n relaxed. Of course there were visuals. So many visuals I could not possibly /n tell you all of them, as time was very different as well. I can tell you it /n began with an eye, that saw me. A sense of myself having waited, maybe as /n if in a queue, and I was finally seen, addressed. It was my turn. /n /n I was matter of factly and sometimes with humor shown many, many things /n about Beverly, and about the world. Much of my thinking was realigned, and /n many old wounds were cleaned out. I also know very strongly that I will /n take this journey again, that Iboga has more for me, and I for Iboga, /n though I realize how presumptuous that sounds. I did indeed communicate /n with my dead elders, remember that was one of my early questions? I also /n think that my 20 some odd year history with meditation and visualization /n and traditional magics were a boon, as was having been fairly sober except /n for marijuana and a couple days of recreational darvocet for some weeks. /n I also did Not want to be disturbed during the experience, and maybe came /n across as bitchy in conveying that (sorry, dear husband!lol). I cried a few /n times during, but it seemed that as soon as the emotion made it to my /n mouth, I was onto healing the next thing. /n /n I came around the next morning full of light. Or maybe just so clean /n inside that my light was visible. If I didn't have a witness, it would be /n almost hard to believe that my skin actually glowed. Light from within, I /n was luminous. I was enamored of my hands, so pretty and soft, though I /n didn't look in a mirror for three days. I didn't think of it. /n /n I again went to the jacuzzi. I was able to sit lotus without a thought in /n my head, not a thought! for ten minutes. This is actually amazing, lol. I /n was and am so calm. I did not want a cigarette, a drink, nothing. I was /n free of all wants, really. A perfectly lovely place to be. /n /n My ovarian cysts have shrunk to the point of being no longer palpable. /n This is down from 9cm and visible when I lay on my back. I no longer need /n surgery for the moment. My surgery was scheduled for 9/14. :) /n /n I then dined on a brilliant plate of fruits. In little teeny tiny bites, /n lol. Everything tasted divine. Interestingly, for most of my life I have /n disliked fruit. Now, I've been to three farmer's markets in one week /n because I can't get enough. I proceeded that same day to read 'The Easy Way /n to Quit Smoking' (thanks to the wonderful human here who brought that to my /n attention) and finished it. I've wanted a cigarette a couple times since, /n but mostly out of boredom and when it's a habit (afetr eating, etc) nothing /n I can't acknowledge away. :) I am not finding alcohol to be an issue any /n longer. I'm not even thinking about it. /n /n I made roast chicken and braised squash on the next night, with a simple /n risotto. I needed a splash of wine for the risotto. The rest of the bottle /n is still sitting in my house. It is a non-issue. /n /n I also must say that emotions bubbled up after, and still are, but not in /n the same way. For the first few days they came like puke or diarrhea. Not /n that it was gross, but definitely was a purge, and there was NO stopping /n it!!! Lol, walking down the street, getting sad about not seeing my beloved /n grandmother one last time before she passed. Looking desperately for an /n alley or hidey hole, because, man, I'm going to sob! After each cry, /n though, I just felt bigger inside. Wider, more expansive. I now fully /n inhabit my skin. /n /n I can breathe into my feet, my breathe moves in me. /n /n Also, in the past I have been buffeted by other people's emotions, I pick /n up on them like a sponge, often to my detriment and confusion. This is /n amazingly under control now. I am less porous, less...vulnerable? Yeah, but /n less porous seems more accurate. I have not lost the ability to connect, /n but it's a choice, and I can see whose emotions are whose. This is such an /n unexpected gift, but just one of many. /n /n I also look much younger, according to husband and dear friends. My face /n feels so relaxed. There is less pain on it, to be sure. /n /n I also am confirmed in needing to escape this darned day job! (In time, in /n time) /n /n There is so much more, but this is a decent brief. /n /n I see many things clearly now, and am confirmed in my thinking on many /n others. /n /n I know I will be working with Iboga in some capacity, I have no idea how, /n but I am confident about it. I did the right thing. /n /n My very heartfelt thanks to Iboga, the place it grew, the hands that /n harvested, the entities that got it from there to me, my husband for /n sitting with me and everyone who has contributed to the movement. /n /n Particular thanks to the individuals who have taken the time to talk with /n me privately, and opened their hearts to me, giving me the gifts of their /n time and attention. /n /n It is my hope to be able to give back at least as much as I have been /n given. /n /n I am a different woman, or maybe just more profoundly and completely the /n woman I've always been. ;) /n /n Love and rockets, /n Tia
